params._marketId: The ID of the resolved market

params._oracle: Address of the oracle contract for fetching winning outcomes

params._betDeadline: Timestamp for when the betting closes
params._category: Category of the bet (e.g., Sports, Crypto)
params._outcomes: Array of possible outcomes for the bet
params._resolutionDeadline: Timestamp for when the bet can be resolved

getAllMarkets().details: Returns arrays of market IDs and their corresponding details

params._outcome: The outcome for which to fetch bets

returns.outcomeWeight: The weight of the bets for this outcome as a percentage of the total pool
returns.totalBetsForOutcome: Total bets placed for the specified outcome

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._marketId: The ID of the market to place a bet on
params._outcome: The outcome the user is betting on

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._marketId: The ID of the market to resolve
The ID of the market to resolve

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

claimWinnings(uint256).notice: Allows winners to claim their winnings from the resolved market

getMarketBets(uint256,string).notice: Gets total bets placed on a specific outcome for a market

getMarketInfo(uint256).notice: Fetches details about a specific market

placeBet(uint256,string).notice: Allows a user to place a bet on a specific outcome of a market

resolveBet(uint256,string).notice: Resolves a bet with the winning outcome from the oracle
